name: Awesome Oscillator Signal Analysis
question: Which stocks are showing Awesome Oscillator momentum change signals?
retailQuestion: Which stocks are picking up or losing momentum?
description: Analyzes Awesome Oscillator (AO) to identify momentum changes through saucer signals, zero line crosses, and twin peaks patterns. Examines histogram color changes and momentum divergences to predict trend acceleration and reversal points.

workflow.description: Step 1: Get active stocks for Awesome Oscillator analysis
Step 2: Get historical price data for AO calculation and signal identification
Step 3: Check portfolio positions for AO momentum assessment
Step 4: Calculate Awesome Oscillator and identify saucer, zero cross, and twin peak signals
Step 5: Rank AO signals by momentum strength and trend change probability
